text: A certificate of legal aid costs is a British "certificate of costs allowed following taxation by a judicial or taxing officer."Her Majesty's Courts Service official British Government web site . Accessed May 5, 2008. Legal Definitions on line. Accessed May 5, 2008. Law Glossary web site . Accessed May 5, 2008. Inter-divorce commercial web site . Accessed May 5, 2008. It actually has nothing to do with legal aid. It is similar to a bill of costs used in Italy,University of Milan at "Roma One" web site . pdf document. Accessed May 5, 2008. and elsewhere. ==See also== * Bill of costs * Judgment (law) * Taxation of costs ==References== Category:Law of the United Kingdom Category:Legal costs
title: Certificate of legal aid costs
